methods.name: info
methods.returns: { name: string, model: string, systemName: string, systemVersion: string, identifier: string }
methods.returnsDescription: 包含设备名称、型号、系统版本等信息的对象

methods.name: battery
methods.returns: { level: number, state: string, lowPowerMode: boolean }
methods.returnsDescription: 包含电量(0-1)、充电状态、低电量模式等信息的对象

methods.name: screen
methods.returns: { width: number, height: number, scale: number, brightness: number }
methods.returnsDescription: 包含屏幕尺寸、缩放比例、亮度等信息的对象
